website_summaries.verdict: While light on accessories for such an expensive Bluetooth headphone pair, the AKG K845 BT delivers a powerful audio experience nonetheless.
pros: Powerful audio performance with deep bass response and crisp mids and highs
cons: No dedicated charger included, no carrying case
No track navigation controls on headphones

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I got to try these out, and they are great! I had NONE of the issues others are mentioning here. They have that "wide magical" AKG sound signature that NO other company at this point offers for BT, were pretty comfortable, look nice, and were easy to use too. BT sounded great, but of course using the wired option meant slightly more clarity & volume. Note: These are over-ear headphones, NOT on-ear. Very highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: RockStar2005

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sound
customer_reviews.text: Sound: Very clear sharp and decent bass. I was very skeptical of the sound quality because it uses Bluetooth but I was very impressive for a Bluetooth. These will replace my SMS audio Sync/kleer headphones. Design: These headphones are serious and mature looking. My complaints are they don't fit my head snug. I read somewhere that you can bend the headband but I'll pass on that. There is no way to forward tracks on the headset. The volume has an obvious limit with my ipod. It's not to bad it's still not a deal breaker. If you guys want a superior sounding headphones that are BT these are it. Don't waste your money on Beats by dre.
customer_reviews.author: Mozzer101

customer_reviews.title: Needs Track Skipping Controls & Asistant Activation
customer_reviews.text: I have an unfair bias towards AKG headphones because they have always been a high end brand I've focused on, but I'm slightly disappointed. These sound great and look great (which are respectively most important), I just wish they had controls for changing tracks and activating digital assistants. The power off button is much easier to push than the pause/play button (resulting in accidentally turning it off). Doesn't get too loud, bass is a little warm, which most people prefer these days. Clear stereo highs. It has its own volume separate from the device you're synced with which is weird.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Flawless Bluetooth pairing, comfortable, and excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: A couple of tries, or more, is all to often the case to pair a new Bluetooth device. Not so with these headphones, paired on the first try. The comfort of these full size cans is as good as my lightweight foam pad on ear headphones. I expected the Bluetooth connection to be just okay, like my other Bluetooth headphones and speaker. What a pleasant surprise that these sound as if they are hard wired.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Borland

customer_reviews.title: I had to put it back on but now it seems fine. The headphones themselves are working fine
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance on these headphones after reading all the reviews. My pair came with one of the AKG plates on the side already loose and floating around the package. I had to put it back on but now it seems fine. The headphones themselves are working fine. I dont see any other flaws in them at this time. They will work well for what I need them for.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfshire

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but 2 issues
customer_reviews.text: Sounds impeccable. Bowers and Wilkins P7 Wireless sound pretty much the same. My regrets with AKG are: 1) short battery life and 2) they arrived broken. One earpiece was making a contant noise that was not natural. I had to fiddle with the earpiece to fix it (after which they sounded perfect), but after some time (a day or so) the noise would occur again. Perfect sound, however, if they don't arrive broken.
customer_reviews.author: Sam R.

customer_reviews.title: High failure rate
customer_reviews.text: Love this headphone but the left side is louder than the right. After a quick google search, this is a common problem with this headphone and this headphone have a high failure rate and poor quality control. I had to reorder a new one from Amazon. Hopefully it's not defective.
customer_reviews.author: K.hang

customer_reviews.title: Excellent craftsmanship, sound and design hits the pavement - a real steal at this price when compared to the competition.
customer_reviews.text: Sound leakage - nil/mild Sound Isolation - Epic Comfort - Excellent Battery - Average Bluetooth range - amazing Volume - Great (I like really loud music and these puppy's can pull their weight). Noise Cancellation? No need. These are way better than the Beats, Bose and Sony's. Why buy a Camaro when you can get an Aston Martin.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Sound is incredible!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely more open sounding than any other closed headphone I've heard. Direct connected to source via 3.5mm plug sounds incredible. Using via Bluetooth is compressed but not bad. Very light for size and super comfortable. Plush leather pads are so soft. Love AKG quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and since it's wireless I don't have to ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and since it's wireless I don't have to worry about being tangled with the cord or it getting caught on something! Works perfectly with my phone so i can listen to my playlist.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit pricey compared to other excellent headphones, but if you want the convenience of a no-wire headphone and have money to spare this is an excellent pair of headphones. Some people say that the volume is slightly low, but I have no issues whatsoever. The fact that the charging port is a standard micro-usb means even without the AKG cable there would be no problems.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Damaged item
customer_reviews.text: Received a defective prodcut. Left ear cup not working. Item is not sealed. Bought from Electronics Expo. Does not look like a honest seller.
customer_reviews.author: W Reveals

customer_reviews.title: Completely fell apart in 18 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in June of 2017 and they steadily degraded. Today the head padding entirely fell off the inside of the headband. The ear pads are also coming apart. The mic is very unreliable. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: L F

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. After my K271MKII broke I looked for a replacement over the ear headphones. I ordered the following AKG Y45BT AKG Q701 Quincy AKG K267 Tiesto AKG K545 & The K845 My least favorite were the Q701 & Y45BT The K267 Tiesto was amazing but I didn't like the fact that you had choice of sound which I didn't see a big difference between them. The K545 is essentially the K845 without bluetooth. Also slightly louder. After trying on the wire free setup, I was sold. The sound is perfectly balanced. I don't listen to it much but the battery so far lasted over 7 hours of listening at full volume. About 1 hour per day.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this headphone cause it has good sound and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: PARK NAM KIL

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Really good. Amazing wireless headphones. Great sound and great base. Take an above average pair of headphones and make them wireless
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Batchelder

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality was fine wired but I couldn't get the bluetooth to work
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was fine wired but I couldn't get the bluetooth to work. Charged overnight, unplugged it and pressed the bluetooth button and no light. Tried NFC pairing and my phone found it, but it could not pair. Will exchange for a new pair and update review. Update: Replacement headphones sound great and are perfect for cosplaying Sakura Futaba from Persona 5. I used a set of replacement ear pads and spray painted them with red floral paint to change the color. Saved hundreds of dollars over the official Futaba AKG K 845s that Atlus put out.
customer_reviews.author: Sean S. Lee

customer_reviews.title: others are great. Because of this
customer_reviews.text: It is trash. The left and right sound balance is not right at all.(Left side is always louder than Right side.) Except the balance problem, others are great. Because of this, I don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Taeil

customer_reviews.title: it works great. Great heaphone for the price with solid battery ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't let people's reviews saying the bluetooth on this device doesn't work, quite the opposite actually, it works great. Great heaphone for the price with solid battery life and colour!
customer_reviews.author: Andrei Stanciu

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, moderate everything else
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great for its price. Bluetooth has some problems however, with an uncommon <1 second pause while moving. Comfort isn't good, but not bad. It comes with a carrier bag, which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The headphone sound great, and very good quality built
customer_reviews.text: Fast service, product receive as describe. The price was cheaper than the AKG website. The headphone sound great, and very good quality built.
customer_reviews.author: Denis Goulet

customer_reviews.title: Serious noise occurs in Bluetooth state I received a defective ...
customer_reviews.text: Serious noise occurs in Bluetooth state I received a defective item and I repaired it with an additional payment.
customer_reviews.author: jinkuk kim

customer_reviews.title: Blue Tooth headphones not up to par yet.
customer_reviews.text: they came defective and even if they worked properly the sound level is weak. It's no wonder they keep dropping in price. Seems like stores just wanna get rid of them.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Murda 'Mil

customer_reviews.title: 2 pretty
customer_reviews.text: sound - 5/3.5 design - 5/4.5 comfort - 5/4 quality - 5/4 price($99) - 5/5 overall - 4.2 pretty cool
customer_reviews.author: seungyong lee

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but could be better
customer_reviews.text: The balance was a bit off with the left being louder than the right. No easy adjustment that I could find. Doesn't quite fit completely around the ear. The overall quality of the sound was good, but the bass left a lot to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: George Bisset

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as great sounding as I expected for the price also very heavy and a three in comfort

customer_reviews.title: Good morning and have a nice day
customer_reviews.text: Nice and I'm not in my phone called you a way to get rid of the exchange rate for next year
customer_reviews.author: sidonay

customer_reviews.title: Real easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and the Sennheiser Urbanite XL both because I could not decide between them. These WORK. No fuss no muss they just work without a lot of complexity. Real easy to use. They connect quickly and easily to any source and then reconnect to any source quickly and easily. If you are thinking of buying these or the Sennheiser and just want to listen to anything get these. If you want more complexity and/or added features then think about the Sennheiser Urbanite. If you just want to listen to something quickly with good sound buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Stephan Funk USA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice akg headphone. There is no problem with right side's volume if you get used to listen it.
customer_reviews.author: Antti

customer_reviews.title: good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality was very good. The problem was the build quality and bluetooth connectivity. The padding on top of the headband started to come unglued from the mettle band. The bluetooth connectivity was unstable, after watching a movie via my computer I attempted to watch another one only to find that the headphones were no longer connected. I had to reconnect in order to watch something else. This was not an isolated an incident, every single time I switched from one program to another I had to reconnect. AKG is a recognized brand and for $300 bucks these issues shouldn't be.
customer_reviews.author: LCJ

customer_reviews.title: Why even go wireless...
customer_reviews.text: There is no way to forward and reverse tracks. Misleading when the description states "control buttons conveniently located on the ear-cups", which many would think, first and foremost, are controls to manage the source content. What's the point in a wireless headphone that needs the device to control audio tracks? I may as well just buy a wired pair with inline controls on the cord. Major fail.
customer_reviews.author: hifi80sman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Little too heavy. And bluetooth is not convenient to connect.
customer_reviews.author: Tong Qi

customer_reviews.title: But good price make me to buy it
customer_reviews.text: in fact, i have this one. But good price make me to buy it. it work very well, thank you
customer_reviews.author: young-jin Cho

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound quality. I thought the build quality could have been better but overall a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: arthur

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: i dont know why this headphone's bluetooth miss its signal too often.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Headphones!!!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great and it's the fullest sound I've head on a wireless set. I had a pair of Sennheiser mm 550-x travel Bluetooth headphones and these blow them out of the water! The bass is rich and the highs are well rounded creating a great all around sound. The noise canceling isn't top of the line but it certainly works. It's a great active noise canceler allowing you to hear when you aren't listening to anything through the headset. A definite great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: 00 I own 3 pair of older AKG headphones and they are all of exceptional quality and sound great!. These horrible ($139
customer_reviews.text: Not worth more than $35.00 Not worth more than $35.00 I own 3 pair of older AKG headphones and they are all of exceptional quality and sound great !. These horrible ($139.00) sounding headphones should not have the AKG label on them. Shame on you Harman.
customer_reviews.author: mflsr

customer_reviews.title: I like collect electric equipments like gaming laptops
customer_reviews.text: I like collect electric equipments like gaming laptops,headphones,keyboards,phones and some fantastic stuff etc.. And this is a very nice and professional headphone. AKG won’t let you down.
customer_reviews.author: LILONGHAO

customer_reviews.title: ... was a rumor that there was a lot of bad loud sounds on one side
customer_reviews.text: There was a rumor that there was a lot of bad loud sounds on one side, but it was true. So I returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected at first, maybe they need a charge...
customer_reviews.text: So far, not happy with the product. Tried them wired in and Bluetooth.... They do not go loud AT ALL!!! My earbuds that cost a fraction of the price blow these away. These will probably be sent back, very dissatisfied for $249.99.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Cote

product_meta.title: AKG K 845BT Bluetooth Wireless On-Ear Headphones, Black
product_meta.description: AKG K845BT headphones follow the Red-Dot Award-winning success of the previous K550 design - with important enhancements like enriched bass response and better-fitting ear-cups. Featuring Bluetooth connectivity and control buttons conveniently located on the ear-cups, the K845BT allows for instant connectivity with multiple devices. Plus, its NFC connectivity allows you to instantly pair with smartphones. Yet it's the K845BT's comfortable fit and no-compromise approach to sound excellence that differentiates them with the first listen. You'll never take them off - but, if you do, their convenient fold-down mechanism allows you to take them with you in their own secure carrying case. If you want to stay connected, do it in style with AKG.
feature_bullets: Specially-selected 50mm drivers and a closed-back design deliver exceptional studio-quality sound. Connectivity Technology: Wireless
Bluetooth and NFC connectivity allows you to connect with your content in an instant
Control buttons conveniently located on the ear-cup allow you to command your sound effortlessly
Super-soft, protein leather ear cushions allows for long-term listening in comfort
A 2D Axis folding mechanism allows the K845BTs to easily fit into a carrying case

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars168 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
